title: Unpatched critical bugs in Versa Concerto lead to auth bypass, RCE
summary: Critical vulnerabilities in Versa Concerto that are still unpatched could allow remote attackers to bypass authentication and execute arbitrary code on affected systems. [...]

title: FBI and Europol Disrupt Lumma Stealer Malware Network Linked to 10 Million Infections

title: Anthropic web config hints at Claude Sonnet 4 and Opus 4
summary: Anthropic is secretly working on two new models called Claude Sonnet 4 and Opus 4, which are believed to be the company's most advanced AI models. [...]

title: OpenAI hints at a big upgrade for ChatGPT Operator Agent
summary: ChatGPT's Operator, which is still in research preview, will soon become a "very useful tool," according to Jerry Tworek, VP of Research at OpenAI. [...]

title: Critical Samlify SSO flaw lets attackers log in as admin
summary: A critical Samlify authentication bypass vulnerability has been discovered that allows attackers to impersonate admin users by injecting unsigned malicious assertions into legitimately signed SAML responses. [...]
